title: Public COVID19 data for Norway
text: covidnor system help organize projects. analyses three () main sections: code, results, data, different requirements (version control/sharing/encryption). provide folder locations ‚Äòorg‚Äô helps take care details. Read introduction vignette run help(package="covidnor").

title: Public COVID19 data for Norway
text: csverse set R packages developed help solve problems frequently occur performing disease surveillance. want install dev versions (access packages haven‚Äôt released CRAN), run usethis::edit_r_profile() edit .Rprofile. write : Save file restart R. can now install csverse packages drat repository.
code: options(   repos = structure(c(     CSVERSE = "https://www.csids.no/drat/",     CRAN    = "https://cran.rstudio.com"   )) ) install.packages("covidnor")
